name: Jquery.messagebox
body:
### Welcome to jquery.messageBox Pages.
jquery.messageBox is a simple system that allows you to add dialogBox or messageBox to your applications / HTML sites.
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the jquery.messageBox for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Usage
First, load jQuery and the plugin in your HTML:

`
<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery.min.js"></script>
<script src="js/jquery.messagebox.js"></script>
`

Load all CSS needed :

`
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.4/css/bootstrap.min.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.3.0/css/font-awesome.min.css">
`
The css file will be loaded by the plugin.

### Plugin initialization
`
var msg = $("body").messageBox({});
`

### Plugin usage

Show a simple alertBox
`
$("#b-warning").click(function(){
	msg.data('messageBox').warning('MessageBox Warning', 'jquery.messageBox is good for you !');
});
`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
